name: Zorkgame curse of the lost
body:
## Curse of the lost

###What's Curse of the lost?

Curse of the lost is a small game inspirated in [Zork game](http://iplayif.com/?story=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ifarchive.org%2Fif-archive%2Fgames%2Fzcode%2Fzdungeon.z5).

This game will be set in sea and islands. The protagonist is shipwrecked and we donâ€™t know his history. 

Our main objective will be leave the area of islands, but there is a problem, the sea is full of sharks and we have no way of killing them, so we must explore the map to find a way to eliminate them. 

Here is a little draw of the map:
![map](https://i.gyazo.com/e4f8ca831af9deec06ede3f136d41775.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
